text: Malda may refer to : * Malda district in West Bengal state, northeastern India * Maldá, city of Malda district, West Bengal * Latin Catholic Apostolic Prefecture of Malda (former; renamed and promoted as Diocese of Dumka) * Malda, Bihar, a village in West Champaran district in Bihar state, northeastern India * Malda, Estonia, a village * Maldà in Catalonia, Spain
title: Malda
